function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation and air circulation on the balcony can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among people using the balcony.","Mitigation":"Install proper ventilation systems and air purifiers to improve air quality and circulation on the balcony.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers.","People":"People using the balcony, residents of the building.","Owner":"Building management, balcony users."},{"Description":"Lack of privacy on the balcony may lead to behaviors that increase the risk of disease transmission, such as talking loudly and playing loud music.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of close interactions and increased exposure to potentially contagious activities.","Mitigation":"Implement privacy screens or partitions to create private spaces on the balcony, and promote awareness of respectful behavior among users.","Technologies":"Privacy screens, acoustic panels.","People":"People using the balcony, residents of the building.","Owner":"Building management, balcony users."},{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning and maintenance of balcony materials may harbor germs and contribute to the spread of diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission from contaminated surfaces and materials.","Mitigation":"Establish regular cleaning schedules and use antimicrobial materials for balcony surfaces.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, cleaning equipment.","People":"People using the balcony, residents of the building.","Owner":"Building management, cleaning staff."}]}
